panelText.text:
• Corruption is any abuse of trust, typically someone using a position of power or influence for private gain. It is illegal and totally prohibited at Johnson Controls.
  • If you witness or suspect behavior that violates our code of ethics or the law, you have a duty to report it.
  • If someone offers you a bribe – cash or anything of value – and you refuse, you should still report the offer to your manager, the Compliance or Law departments, or other appropriate company resources. You can also contact the Integrity Helpline.
You must always protect any personal information that you have in your possession.

instructionText.text: Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.
